sense.gloss: chief seat, seat of honor, seat of honour, head of the table

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑食卓↑↓しょくたく↓の|↑上座|↑↓かみざ↓についた。
sdata.e: He sat at the head of the table.
